definition: 5th earthly branch: 7-9 a.m., 3rd solar month (5th April-4th May), year of the Dragon/ancient Chinese compass point: 120°

sentences.chinese: 必定來出席我的壽辰宴會。

sentences.english: I received a set of gardening tools on my birthday.
sentences.chinese: 壽辰那天，我收到一套園藝工具。

sentences.english: Doctor Smith sent me a touchhday present yesterday .
sentences.chinese: 史密斯博士前一天送給我一份壽辰禮物。

sentences.english: You rememprover her from my celebrine two years ago?
sentences.chinese: 還記得她嗎？兩年前插手過我的壽辰派對。

sentences.english: They congratulated him on his seventieth birthday.
sentences.chinese: 他們祝賀他七十歲壽辰。

definition: to offer birthday congratulations (to an elderly person)
to die/to depart this life (euphemism)/same as 去世
9-11 pm (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
reign name (1909-1911) of the last Qing emperor Pu Yi 溥儀|溥仪
may you enjoy boundless longevity (idiom)/long may you live
official seal/imperial or royal seal/papal bull
Birthday of the Flowers, spring festival on lunar 12th or 15th February
